GameConditionDef.label: blessing of the Wind
GameConditionDef.description: Your ritual called in the whirling wind.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Your ritual seems to have called in gusts of refreshing wind. It will blow away excessive heat, reducing the duration of global warming and heat wave.\n\nIt should pass in about a day.

GameConditionDef.label: blessing of the Sun
GameConditionDef.description: Your ritual brought the brilliance of the sun.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The Sun has gained its brilliance. It immediately ends the eclipse and forces clear weather for some time. It will also

GameConditionDef.label: blessing of the Rain
GameConditionDef.description: Your ritual brought the dark clouds.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Your ritual seems to have spawned the dark clouds forming above you. It will start to rain and helps to settle toxic particles or volcanic dusts.\n\nIt should pass in about a day.

GameConditionDef.label: dark aurora
GameConditionDef.description: An aurora is lighting up the sky. The breathtaking display will boost the mood of anyone outside to see it.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A beautiful aurora is lighting up the sky.\n\nThe undulating colors will boost the mood of anyone outside to see them, and make the night brighter.
